name: Simple Modal
description: This component makes it possible to display alert, get some information or confirm some action

properties.name: initialState
properties.label: Initial State
properties.settingTooltip: This setting allows you to specify the component's initial state, whether it will be displayed or not.

properties.name: title
properties.label: Title
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the title.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to write title for Simple Modal.

properties.name: content
properties.label: Content
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the text content of modal window.
properties.defaultValue: Cras mattis consectetur purus sit amet fermentum. Cras justo odio, dapibus ac facilisis in, egestas eget quam. Morbi leo risus, porta ac consectetur ac, vestibulum at eros.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to write content for Simple Modal.

properties.name: submitButtonLabel
properties.label: Submit Button Label
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the label for Submit Button.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to write label for Submit Button. Default value "Submit".

properties.name: closeButtonLabel
properties.label: Close Button Label
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the label for Close Button.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to write label for close button. Default value "Close".

properties.name: type
properties.label: Type
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to select type of Simple Modal ("alert", "prompt", "confirm").

properties.name: placeholder
properties.label: Placeholder
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for the logic to determine the text for input placeholder.
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to write text for input placeholder.

properties.name: closingDuration
properties.label: Closing Duration(ms)
properties.settingTooltip: Allows to specify speed animation opening and closing for Simple Modal.

eventHandlers.name: onClose
eventHandlers.label: On Close Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggers when the user clicks on the close button.

eventHandlers.name: onSubmit
eventHandlers.label: On Submit Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggers when the user clicks on the submit button.

eventHandlers.name: onInputValueChange
eventHandlers.label: On Input Value Change
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggers when the user changes the input value.
